xwikidoc.name: MimeTypeConfig
xwikidoc.creator: XWiki.LudovicDubost
xwikidoc.author: XWiki.ShermanTank
xwikidoc.content: ## displayer by category or filetype ## if a filetype has a displayer it will be used ## otherwise it will be the one for the category ## if none is set the system will look for a displayer named by the category ## if the displayer is not present it will fallback to a generic displayer displayer_document=attachment displayer_audio=attachment displayer_video=video displayer_interactive=flash displayer_archive=archive displayer_image=image displayer_text=text displayer_collection=collection displayer_mp3=mp3 displayer_tif=attachment ## extension to category mapping ## this allows to find the category corresponding ## to a file type category_sco=archive category_zip=archive category_gz=archive category_xo=archive category_sit=archive category_gtar=archive category_tar=archive category_wav=audio category_mp3=audio category_notebook=document category_odt=document category_odg=document category_odp=document category_ods=document category_odc=document category_odf=document category_odb=document category_odi=document category_ppt=document category_doc=document category_pdf=document category_xls=document category_txt=document category_xml=document category_css=document category_rtf=document category_cdcr=document category_dir=document category_exe=document category_bin=document category_iha=document category_izh=document category_class=document category_php=document category_jar=document category_ps=document category_htm=document category_html=document category_docx=document category_pptx=document category_xlsx=document category_svg=image category_gif=image category_jpg=image category_tif=image category_bmp=image category_jpg=image category_jpg=image category_png=image category_psd=image category_swf=interactive category_qt=video category_wmv=video category_asf=video category_avi=video category_mpg=video category_mov=video category_vidi=video ## extensions to filetype mapping extension_sco=sco extension_zip=zip extension_gz=gz extension_xo=xo extension_sit=sit extension_gtar=gtar extension_tar=tar extension_wav=wav extension_mp3=mp3 extension_notebook=notebook extension_odt=odt extension_odg=odg extension_odp=odp extension_ods=ods extension_odc=odc extension_odf=odf extension_odb=odb extension_odi=odi extension_ppt=ppt extension_doc=doc extension_pdf=pdf extension_xls=xls extension_txt=txt extension_xml=xml extension_css=css extension_rtf =rtf extension_dcr=cdcr extension_dir=dir extension_exe=exe extension_bin=bin extension_lha=iha extension_lzh=izh extension_class=class extension_php=php extension_jar=jar extension_ps=ps extension_htm=htm extension_html=html extension_svg=svg extension_gif=gif extension_jpg=jpg extension_tif=tif extension_bmp=bmp extension_jpe=jpg extension_jpeg=jpg extension_png=png extension_psd=psd extension_swf=swf extension_qt=qt extension_wmv=wmv extension_asf=asf extension_avi=avi extension_mpg=mpg extension_mpeg=mpg extension_mov=mov extension_pptx=pptx extension_docx=docx extension_xlsx=xlsx extension_vidi=vidi ## mimetype to filetype mapping ## this is unused for now mimetype_contentpackage/ims=sco mimetype_application/zip=zip mimetype_application/x-gzip=gz mimetype_contentpackage/xo=xo mimetype_application/x-sit=sit mimetype_application/x-gtar=gtar mimetype_application/x-tar=tar mimetype_audio/x-wav=wav mimetype_audio/mpeg=mp3 mimetype_application/notebook=notebook mimetype_application/vnd.oasis.opendocument.text =odt mimetype_application/vnd.oasis.opendocument.graphics =odg mimetype_application/vnd.oasis.opendocument.presentation=odp mimetype_application/vnd.oasis.opendocument.spreadsheet=ods mimetype_application/vnd.oasis.opendocument.chart =odc mimetype_application/vnd.oasis.opendocument.formula=odf mimetype_application/vnd.oasis.opendocument.database=odb mimetype_application/vnd.oasis.opendocument.image=odi mimetype_application/vnd.ms-powerpoint=ppt mimetype_application/msword=doc mimetype_application/pdf=pdf mimetype_application/vnd.ms-excel=xls mimetype_text/plain=txt mimetype_text/xml=xml mimetype_text/css=css mimetype_text/rtf=rtf mimetype_application/x-director=cdcr mimetype_application/x-director=dir mimetype_application/exe=exe mimetype_application/octet-stream=bin mimetype_application/octet-stream=iha mimetype_application/octet-stream=izh mimetype_application/x-java-vm=class mimetype_application/x-php=php mimetype_application/java-archive =jar mimetype_application/postscript=ps mimetype_text/html=htm mimetype_text/html=html mimetype_image/svg+xml=svg mimetype_image/gif=gif mimetype_image/jpeg=jpg mimetype_image/tif=tif mimetype_image/x-ms-bmp=bmp mimetype_image/jpeg=jpg mimetype_image/jpeg=jpg mimetype_image/png=png mimetype_image/x-photoshop=psd mimetype_application/x-shockwave-flash=swf mimetype_video/quicktime=qt mimetype_video/x-msvideo=wmv mimetype_video/x-msvideo=asf mimetype_video/x-msvideo=avi mimetype_video/mpeg=mpg mimetype_video/quicktime=mov
